Title: Like Arrows
Writer: Alex Kendrick (Written By), Bob Lepine (Written By), Dinika Peeples (story by), Kevin Peeples (Written By), Kevin Peeples (story by)
Actors: Victoria Anastasi, Carter Babcock, Elizabeth Becka, Les Best
Plot: When conflict, rebellion and resentment overwhelm their family, Charlie and Alice are forced to change their parenting strategy, and are surprised to find effective, life-long solutions were closer than they imagined.
